results.name: Hidden Words - Word Search Game Unity Template

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
